data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shi, Fu-Ming, Wang, Ping (2015): The genus Conocephalus Thunberg (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Conocephalinae) in Hainan, China with description of one new species. Zootaxa 3994 (1): 142-144, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3994.1.8
